## sd() function

Moving standard deviation, calculates mean square error to SMA and yields sequence of `sqrt(error / period)`<!-- -->.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bollinger\_Bands](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bollinger_Bands)

Note: the number of results will be `period-1` less than the number of processed inputs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sd(period?: number, scale?: number): Transducer<number, number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  period | <code>number</code> |  |
|  scale | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<number, number>`
